de.gulden.application.jjack

Class JJack

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gulden.application.jjack.JJack

  • public class JJack
extends java.lang.Object
    JJack shell application to run audio processor clients.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Jens Gulden

      • usage

        private static void usage()
        Output usage message, then exit.

      • help

        private static void help()
        Output usage message and help, then exit.

      • layout

        private static javax.swing.JComponent layout(JJackAudioProcessor p)
        Lays out all visible components a JJackAudioProcessor and all following JJackAudioProcessors connected to it. Chained processors are layouted horizontally, heading to the right direction. Monitor processors are layouted vertically, heading to the bottom.
        Parameters:
        p - first audio processor to layout
        Returns:
        container component with all layouted visible components

      • addAsToolbar

        private static void addAsToolbar(java.awt.Container parent,
                                 javax.swing.JComponent p,
                                 java.lang.Object constraints)
        Adds a component to a container, after surrounding it with a JToolbar.
        Parameters:
        parent - the container-component where the component is to be added to
        p - the component

      • parseChain

        private static JJackAudioProcessor parseChain()
        Parses a client chain parameter string, instanciates and interconnected the client objects.
        Returns:
        the first client in chain, with other clients interconnected to it

      • connectMonitor

        private static void connectMonitor(JJackAudioProcessor a,
                                   JJackAudioProcessor b)
        Connects a monitor-client to another client.
        Parameters:
        a - the client to connect the monitor to
        b - the monitor to be connected

      • connectChain

        private static void connectChain(JJackAudioProcessor a,
                                 JJackAudioProcessor b)
        Chains a client to another client.
        Parameters:
        a - the client to chain the other client to
        b - the client to be chained

      • parseParameters

        private static void parseParameters(JJackAudioProcessor p)
        Parses parameters for the given audio processor. A parameter list is given in round brackets. It may be missing to use deault parameters only.
        Parameters:
        p - client whose parameters are to be set

      • create

        private static JJackAudioProcessor create(java.lang.String classname)
        Instantiates an instance of the audio processor class given as string.
        Parameters:
        classname - the class name of a class implementinf JJackAudioProcessor
        Returns:
        the audio processor instance.

      • findClass

        private static java.lang.Class findClass(java.lang.String classname)
        Find the class named by classname, using imported packages as search paths.
        Parameters:
        classname - Unqualified or fully qualified classname. If unqualified, an appropriate import package must have been specified before.
        Returns:
        The class. null will never be returned, a global error is thrown if not found.

      • assignParameter

        private static void assignParameter(java.lang.Object o,
                                    java.lang.String paramname,
                                    java.lang.String valueStr)
        Set parameter value through runtime reflection.
        Parameters:
        o - the object on which a field is to be set
        valueStr - the string representation of the value to be set, will be converted to the field's type

      • parseOption

        private static void parseOption()
        Parses a single command line option switch.

      • initTokenizer

        private static void initTokenizer(java.lang.String s)
        Initialize the command line tokenizer.
        Parameters:
        s - complete command line string (joined array components of String[] args, or loaded from a text file)

      • nextToken

        private static void nextToken()
        Reads next token into global variable tok. If no more tokens are available, tok becomes null.

      • requireToken

        private static void requireToken()
        Makes sure that the previous call to nextToken() leads to a next valid token. Otherwise outputs usage message and exits.

      • nextTokenRequired

        private static void nextTokenRequired()
        Reads next token and makes sure that it is a valid one. Otherwise outputs usage message and exits.

      • cast

        private static java.lang.Object cast(java.lang.Object o,
                                     java.lang.Class castTo)
        Tests if a class cast would succeed. If it would fail, outputs a detailed error message and exit.
        Parameters:
        o - instance to be casted
        castTo - type to cast to
        Returns:
        instance o again, to allow performing the actual cast right after calling this

      • message

        private static void message(java.lang.String msg)
        Outputs a text message.
        Parameters:
        msg - text message to output
